languages.text: {n}При этих словах архмиллитант ухмыляется Соломону почти заговорщески, словно старый знакомый.{/n}
{n}At these words, the Arch-Militant shoots Solomorne an almost conspiratorial grin, as though they were old friends.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При этих словах архмиллитант ухмыляется Соломону почти заговорщески, словно старый знакомый.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At Solomorne's words, the Arch-Militant shoots him an almost conspiratorial grin as if they were old friends.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到这席话，温斯特凯尔的首席战士对索罗蒙露出了近乎阴谋的笑容，仿佛两人是老友一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At these words, the Arch-Militant shoots Solomorne an almost conspiratorial grin, as though they were old friends.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到这席话，温斯特凯尔的首席战士对索罗蒙露出了近乎阴谋的笑容，仿佛两人是老友一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al oír estas palabras, el Archimilitante lanza una mirada casi conspiradora a Solomorne, como si fueran viejos amigos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At these words, the Arch-Militant shoots Solomorne an almost conspiratorial grin, as though they were old friends.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al oír estas palabras, el Archimilitante lanza una mirada casi conspiradora a Solomorne, como si fueran viejos amigos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En entendant ces mots, l'archimilitant adresse un sourire presque complice à Solomorne, comme s'ils étaient de vieux amis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At these words, the Arch-Militant shoots Solomorne an almost conspiratorial grin, as though they were old friends.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En entendant ces mots, l'archimilitant adresse un sourire presque complice à Solomorne, comme s'ils étaient de vieux amis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この言葉を聞いて、アーク・ミリタントはソロモーンにまるで旧友のような、どこか共謀者めいた笑みを向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At these words, the Arch-Militant shoots Solomorne an almost conspiratorial grin, as though they were old friends.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この言葉を聞いて、アーク・ミリタントはソロモーンにまるで旧友のような、どこか共謀者めいた笑みを向けた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu sözlere karşılık Başmilitan, sanki eski arkadaşlarmış gibi Solomorne'a neredeyse komplocu bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At these words, the Arch-Militant shoots Solomorne an almost conspiratorial grin, as though they were old friends.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu sözlere karşılık Başmilitan, sanki eski arkadaşlar gibi Solomorne'a neredeyse komplocu bir şekilde gülümsedi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bei diesen Worten grinst der Erzmilitant Solomorne beinahe verschwörerisch an, als wäre sie alte Freunde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At these words, the Arch-Militant shoots Solomorne an almost conspiratorial grin, as though they were old friends.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei diesen Worten grinst der Erzmilitant Solomorne beinahe verschwörerisch an, als wäre sie alte Freunde.{/n}
